title: Universal Buys Minority Stake in Steven Spielberg’s Amblin

organizations.name: amblin james gourley/rex/shutterstock  54am pt  universal filmed entertainment

text:
James Gourley/REX/Shutterstock  54AM PT 
Universal Filmed Entertainment has agreed to buy a minority stake in Steven Spielberg ’s Amblin Partners with chairman Jeff Shell joining the Amblin board. 
Universal joins Amblin Partners’ investors, which includes Participant Media, Reliance Entertainment, Entertainment One (eOne), and Alibaba Pictures. 
“We are big believers in Amblin Partners and its proven ability to create the kind of quality films that appeal to broad, global audiences,” said Shell in a statement with Vice Chairman Ron Meyer and Chairman Donna Langley. 
“Steven is a genius and has always been part of our family, as well as an incredible partner to Universal. We are thrilled to become strategic investors in the company that he, Michael and Jeff are committed to growing.” 
More coming
